resources.string: to the Red Cross Business Resilience Tool and congratulations on embarking upon your journey to resilience
Do you want to know your situation?\n Start answering a few questions!
You have just arrived at work to find fire fighters dampening down the glowing embers of the building holding your key business resources

This tool is designed to be completed at your own pace. There are activities in the tool that will take time to complete, often with your staff.\n\nWe encourage you to take the time and get the most out of the activities before continuing on your journey.
There might be a few elements\nmissing from your Business\nContinuity Plan
